engagement_descriptions.people_who_use_drugs_other: Interaction of public safety staff with users during calls for service and assistance.
engagement_descriptions.people_in_recovery_other: Members of Public Safety employees who are Interact with people in recovery when assisting others in crisis.
engagement_descriptions.families_impacted_other: Members of Public Safety employees who interact with and assist family members and friends of those in recovery in various settings.

disparities_assessment.barriers: Did not have a formal way to measure disparities in a way that would formulate methods to improve assistance because of lack of trained staff or mental health or substance abuse clinicians.

planning.process: We did not engage in a planning process.

treatment.barriers: The Town of Kingston is working to acquire staff that would be able to oversee projects that would use the Settlement funds. It has taken longer than expected.
